name: Strategy Runner
description:
You control a team of soldiers trying to escape enemy territory after a mission gone wrong. The team is chased by the enemy and forced to be constantly on the run. Tough choices are guaranteed. Imagine turn-based battles in a procedurally generated world where the map is constantly expanded as you move forward. Your soldiers get stronger with every step they take. The game is currently in early development and features a basic set of skills and a single randomly generated area. All assets are placeholder and will be replaced, as soon as I find an artist that is willing to work on this project!

Planned Features:

  • Skill and Level System
  • Quest System with generated quests
  • Inventory System
  • Hit Probability
  • Improved Camera Management
  • Multiple Biomes
